LightningComponentBundle.description: Simple Conditional Layout displaying a section or another depending on a single condition

property.name: forceDisplay
property.label: Force Complete Display?
property.description: Flag to force the display of all sections (for Builder configuration).

property.name: currentValue
property.label: Current Value
property.description: Field value provided from the page context.

property.name: operator
property.label: Operator
property.datasource: IS TRUE,IS FALSE,IS BLANK,IS NOT BLANK,EQUALS,NOT EQUALS,IN,NOT IN,CONTAINS,CONTAINS NOT,MATCHES,MATCHES NOT

property.name: targetValue
property.label: Target Value
property.description: Target value with which the current value should be compared

property.name: hasDefault
property.label: Show Default?
property.description: Flag to activate default section when condition not met.

property.name: wrappingClass
property.label: Wrapping CSS
property.description: CSS classes to wrap each section.
